forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain giving way to foggy conditions overnight. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain giving way to foggy conditions overnight. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
